Where to Find Topics for Future Seminars

Below is a list of suggested places to find interesting socratic seminar topics to discuss at BitDevs Cotonou meetups. If you have any others to add to the list let us know.

Mailing Lists, News Letters, Q&As

  • bitcoin-dev mailing list
  • lightning-dev mailing list
  • Bitcoin Optech
  • Bitcoin Stack Exchange

Github Repositories

  • Bitcoin Core
  • Core Lightning
  • Lightning Network Daemon
  • Eclair
  • rust-bitcoin
  • Lightning Dev Kit
  • Bitcoin Dev Kit
  • Fedimint

Other Meetups

  • BitdevsNBO
  • BitdevsLagos
  • Bitcoin Core Review Club
  • LND PR Review Club
  • LDK PR Review Club
  • BitDevs NYC
  • BitDevs SF
  • BitDevs London
  • BitDevs Chicago
  • BitDevs Sydney
  • BitDevs Berlin
  • BitDevs Los Angeles
  • BitDevs Nashville
  • BitDevs Vancouver

Freenode IRC

  • #bitcoin-core-pr-reviews
  • #bitcore-core-dev
